name: Find the Diamond
description:
Find the Diamond is the result of a challenge where I had to create a game in 3 days. It is my first project on this page and as a beginner in game development who has done this for only a few months, I hope more experienced developers will be able to give me a few tips.

Find the Diamond is a game where the player travels through a random generated dungeon and has to find the diamond at the end. The room in which the diamond is located is also random. Due to a mistake of mine I wasn't able to fix in three days, it is possible that the diamond is located within the start room. In this case, restarting should solve the problem.

This game can be played with both controller and keyboard.

CONTROLS:(Keyboard/X-Box Controller)

Escape/Select: Going back to the start scrren or quitting the game

WASD/Joystick: Moving

Space/X-Button: Sword Swing

Enter/Start: Pausing

Potions who appear sometimes after defeating all enemies in one room and the diamond can be collected by walking into them.

Thank you for playing my game in advance and have fun :)

Install instructions
  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on Find The Diamond.exe
  • Enjoy
